title: Kona Grill has 19 locations across multiple states
statement: Kona Grill operates locations in 19 cities across states including Georgia, Idaho, Indiana, Ohio, Texas, Colorado, Minnesota, Arizona, Alabama, Missouri, Nevada, Illinois, Florida, Michigan, and New Jersey.
